attributes.action: The Introduction of Stricter Controls/ Punishments for Bullies
attributes.additional_details:
Enabling schools to deal with and punish bullies more effectively.
Creating the best awareness of bullying to children from infant school to secondary.
More serious consequences whether internally in the school or criminally (should they commit a criminal offence) for the offenders.

Remember bullying isn't always just someone calling you names in the playground, it can end up in young people attempting to take or taking their own lives. It's time someone stood up for them!
